projectGridLines.description:
Title: Acquisition Product Management Intern - Remit Money

Description:

You will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing

strategies to drive user acquisition for the Remit Money platform. The role involves

collaborating with marketing agencies, creating compelling content, and

leveraging AI platforms to generate quality funnels. You’ll focus on organic user

acquisition through content marketing and user-generated content. Additionally,

you will be responsible for attributing user growth to the right channels and

ensuring the platform throttles effectively to maximize user acquisition.

Responsibilities:

? Develop and execute digital marketing strategies


? Collaborate with agencies to ensure campaigns are on track

? Focus on content marketing and user-generated content

? Devise content strategies to attract users organically

? Leverage AI platforms to create quality acquisition funnels

? Attribute user growth to the right marketing channels

? Ensure throttling on the most effective platforms to optimize user growth

Skills Needed:

? Knowledge of digital marketing and content creation

? Experience with content strategy

? Strong collaboration and communication skills

? Basic understanding of AI platforms for marketing

? Ability to analyze user acquisition data and attribute growth to specific

channels

? Experience with analytics frameworks (Google analytics + clarity)


Project 3


Title: Activation Product Management Intern - Remit Money

Description:

You will focus on ensuring users are successfully onboarded and complete their

first transaction. This role requires close collaboration with support teams to

address user concerns quickly and efficiently. You will also work on improving the

user journey from sign-up to the first transaction, ensuring seamless activation.

Responsibilities:

? Own the funnels along with other PMs in your Team

? Collaborate with support teams to resolve user issues and improve

onboarding

? Ensure that users complete their first transaction

? Streamline the onboarding process to reduce friction

? Identify and address pain points in the activation funnel

Skills Needed:

? Strong understanding of product management and user flows

? Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams (support, tech)

? Problem-solving and communication skills

? Experience in improving user activation and transaction rates


Project 4


Title: Retention Product Management Intern - Remit Money (Customers)

Description:

You will be responsible for analyzing user cohorts and driving strategies to

increase return transactions. This role involves deep data analysis to identify

patterns in user behavior and devising initiatives that ensure users return to the

platform for repeat transactions. You’ll also collaborate with marketing and

product teams to develop retention campaigns.

Responsibilities:

? Analyze user cohorts and transaction patterns to identify retention

opportunities

? Develop strategies to increase repeat transactions

? Collaborate with marketing to create retention campaigns


? Monitor key metrics related to user retention and transaction frequency

Skills Needed:

? Proficiency in data analysis and cohort studies

? Understanding of user retention strategies

? Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

? Collaboration skills to work with marketing and product teams


Project 5


Title: Product Management Intern - Remit Money (Business)

Description:

You will help streamline cross-border transfers for businesses by managing the

product roadmap for our B2B platform. The role involves working closely with

stakeholders to build a seamless solution that addresses the needs of businesses

and partners worldwide, focusing on stability, compliance, and operational

efficiency.

Skill Sets:

? Experience in product development or management

? Analytical skills to understand business needs

? Knowledge of cross-border payments and compliance (preferred)

? Proficiency with project management and collaboration tools

? Strategic thinking and problem-solving skills

Traits Expectation:

? Strong leadership and decision-making ability

? Customer-focused mindset

? Strategic thinker with attention to detail

Expected Learning:

? Practical experience in managing a B2B product in fintech

? Exposure to cross-border payments and compliance

? Hands-on experience in product development

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution:

? Product Management or Business Strategy

? International Finance or Cross-Border Payments


Project 6


Title: Product Management Intern - Investment Product

Description:

You will manage the product lifecycle of a new investment product that gives NRIs

access to crypto investments with an expected 12% IRR. The role involves market

research, feature development, and aligning business objectives with customer

needs.

Skill Sets:

? Strong interest in investment and fintech products

? Analytical skills to conduct market research

? Knowledge of crypto investments and stablecoins


? Familiarity with financial compliance and regulatory requirements

Traits Expectation:

? Entrepreneurial mindset

? Ability to prioritize and execute quickly

? Strong communication skills

Expected Learning:

? Understanding of crypto investments and financial product development

? Exposure to managing high-value investment products

? Market research and product positioning experience

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution:

? Investment Management or Financial Products
